summary: The converters package provides utilities that translate Qiskit pulse‑level objects—such as local oscillator configurations and pulse instructions or schedules—into the OpenPulse‑compatible Qobj representation required by quantum backends, and also supports the reverse transformation.
business_intent: Allow users to define pulse‑level programs in Qiskit and have them automatically converted into the low‑level Qobj format that quantum hardware can execute, ensuring correct mapping of frequencies, pulse shapes, and measurement/control directives.
